/* WebMenuMapper.selectWebMenu */
SELECT A.RESRCE_CD, A.P_RESRCE, A.RESRCE_FG, A.FUNC_FG, A.RESRCE_NM, A.URL, A.SPCL_AUTHOR, A.DISP_LEVEL, A.DISP_IDX FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.RESRCE_CD = #{resrceCd} OR ( A.P_RESRCE = #{resrceCd} AND A.RESRCE_FG = 'F' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' )

/* WebMenuMapper.selectWebMenuLevel */
SELECT A.RESRCE_CD, A.P_RESRCE, A.RESRCE_FG, A.FUNC_FG, A.RESRCE_NM, A.URL, A.SPCL_AUTHOR, A.DISP_LEVEL, A.DISP_IDX, A.USE_YN, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO A WHERE A.DISP_LEVEL = #{level} AND A.RESRCE_FG = 'M' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.DISP_IDX ASC

/* WebMenuMapper.selectWebMenuByResrceCd */
SELECT A.RESRCE_CD, A.P_RESRCE, A.RESRCE_FG, A.FUNC_FG, A.RESRCE_NM, A.URL, A.SPCL_AUTHOR, A.DISP_LEVEL, A.DISP_IDX FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.RESRCE_CD = #{resrceCd}
